query:
ALTER TABLE market_reports 
DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS btc_state,
DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS btc_liquidity_tag,
DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS btc_confidence,
DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS btc_evidence_json;
